channel.title: Jacob's portfiolio website
channel.description: Recent content on Jacob's portfiolio website

item.title: My first post
item.description: Heyo. This is my first blog entry ever. I’m not sure what to write about here. There’s a lot of potential topics I want to cover here relating to my career and hobbies. I’m planning on figuring out how to load webassembly and have some interesting content/games load onto this website. For now, I need to figure out how hugo really works for building websites. There’s a lot of integrations that are available for the theme I’m using for this site that I want to explore (such as comments for posts).

item.title: About
item.description: Hey there. I’m Jacob. I’m a software engineer with a bachelors degree in computer science. I operate in many software domains; including but not limited to: graphics, web, systems, languages, and, game development. I care a lot about open source software, education, and sustainable software practices. My favorite languages are - Rust ðŸ¦€, Typescript, C#, and Go/Golang. I’m also comfortable with working in any of the “C descended languages” such as C++, PHP, Perl, etc.

item.title: Projects
item.description: You can check out some of my projects on my github.
